Selected Answer: CDG
NO DELETE (E) as it operates on rows of a table.

questions.question_text: Which three SQL statements, embedded in PL/SQL, typically benefit from using variables declared with %ROWTYPE? (Choose three.)

choices.G: A function defined with the PARALLEL_ENABLE clause may be executed in parallel in a SELECT statement or a subquery in a DML statement.
choices.B: The NOCOPY hint asks the compiler to pass the actual parameters by reference.
choices.D: The NOCOPY hint asks the compiler to pass the actual parameters by value.
choices.A: The PARALLEL_ENABLE clause can be used only in the CREATE FUNCTION statement.
choices.F: The PARALLEL_ENABLE clause can be specified for a nested function.
choices.E: A function is deterministic if it always returns the same result for a specific combination of input values.
choices.C: A deterministic function's results always depend on the state of session variables.

questions.question_text: Which three are true about the NOCOPY hint, the PARALLEL ENABLE hint, and the DETERMINISTIC clause? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
he PARALLEL_ENABLE clause can appear in the following SQL statements:
CREATE FUNCTION Statement

CREATE PACKAGE Statement

CREATE TYPE BODY Statement


https://docs.oracle.com/en/database/oracle/oracle-database/21/lnpls/PARALLEL_ENABLE-clause.html#GUID-CFF3C7D3-6438-44C2-9FAF-569F246C37CA
B and E and G are TRUE!

choices.A: They can be used in any type of loop.
choices.C: They have the same effect on the execution of a loop.
choices.B: They must have a WHEN condition.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct

questions.question_text: Which is true about EXIT and CONTINUE statements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BFG
Es correcto las constantes o variables no tiene porque inicializarse solo desde otros paquetes. Si es obligatorio que sean inicializadas si son cosntantes o si son variables not null

choices.B: This will not compile successfully because the loan_amount variable is declared NOT NULL but lacks an initialization assignment.
choices.D: Initialization of min_bal can be done while using this packaged constant in another program.
choices.F: This will not compile successfully because the min_bal constant must be initialized.
choices.A: This is a PACKAGE specification. A PACKAGE BODY is needed to use this.
choices.C: This program unit will compile successfully.
choices.G: This is BODILESS PACKAGE. A PACKAGE BODY is not required to use this.
choices.E: Initialization of loan_amount can be done while using this packaged variable in another program.

choices.D: Field names must match selected column names.
choices.B: Field types must match column types.
choices.A: They can be returned from a function.
choices.C: The number of fields must match the number of columns in a table.
